name: PyRunner
summary:
Welcome to PyRunner, an endless-runner game where you join PyGuy in a fun and challenging adventure to retrieve his dropped pies! Help him navigate through a shut-down highway, filled with obstacles and... other stuff...

Collect Pies: PyGuy needs your help to gather as many pies as he can. The more pies you collect, the higher your score and the more options you have to unlock W features.

Slide Under Obstacles: Test your reflexes and agility as you slide under barriers and fences to avoid obstacles that come your way. Quick thinking is the key to success!

Avoid Cars: Beware of cars passing through! Dodge the oncoming vehicles. slide through narrow gaps to keep PyGuy safe on his pie-retrieving mission.

Trade Pies for Unique Power-Ups: Exchange your collected pies for awesome power-ups. Activate a shield for protection, slow-down time, and more!

Customize PyGuy: Show off your style by customizing PyGuy with various outfits. Pick look that fits your style as you run through the highway.

Compete for the Highest Pie Count: Get as much as you can. If you think you have enough, you are mistaken.

Join PyGuy on his thrilling adventure in PyRunner! I mean, it's a guy running for pies. How dare you pass? Download now and help him reclaim his dropped pies. It's time to run, slide, and collect your way to victory! Are you up for the challenge? Let's get started!
